content: **crocheted drops easter egg warmer in snow with pompon** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measure** appr 9 cm \ 3½ high + pompon **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 50 g color no 01 off white 50 g color no 24 yellow drops crochet hook size 6 \ us j/10 or the size needed to obtain 12 single_crochet on 4 in width crochet egg warmer in stripes of off white and yellow eskimo of your own choice uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=3640&cid=19
